keyword: how many calories in 1 tablespoon of peanut butter
title: How Many Calories in 1 Tablespoon Peanut Butter?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in 1 tablespoon of peanut butter, including macros like fat and protein, plus tweaks and FAQs for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories in 1 Tablespoon Peanut Butter?
assumptions: Smooth, natural peanut butter (no added sugar or salt), ~16 g per tablespoon.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, type (natural vs. regular), additives, and serving size. Check labels for accuracy.

quick_answer.text: One tablespoon of peanut butter provides ~94 kcal, 4 g protein, and 8 g healthy fats.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tablespoon of peanut butter?
faqs.a: Approximately 94 kcal for natural smooth peanut butter.

faqs.q: Is peanut butter high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, about 8 g total fat per tablespoon, mostly unsaturated and healthy.

faqs.q: How much protein in a tablespoon of peanut butter?
faqs.a: Around 4 g, making it a good plant-based protein source.

faqs.q: Does natural peanut butter have less calories?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 10-20 kcal less than sweetened varieties due to no added sugars.

faqs.q: What about carbs in peanut butter?
faqs.a: Low at ~3.5 g per tablespoon, with 1.1 g fiber and minimal sugars.
